description: It's pretty much the last multi-protocol client for Linux that keeps up with the new wave of IM services due to an extensive list of purple plugins.
I use it for facebook and skype chat.
Supports any protocol I need.
summary: Works very good with some partial problems

summary: SImple client that just works every single time

description: Finally a perfect substitution for awfull Skype client!

I've used Pidgin for years, starting back when it was called Gaim. Many of the protocols that made it the go-to multi-protocol client (MSN, AIM, Yahoo!, ICQ) have either gone offline or lost any relevance.

Most of the current chat apps are not compatible with Pidgin or its underlying libpurple, by design (Facebook doesn't want you to use anything but "Messenger" to access their service. Or the Whatsapp client for the Whatsapp service, or the Instagram app for the Instagram service).

So we are left with Jabber (XMPP) and a few extra services that can work, such as Telegram. Fore these, it works well and gets the job done (except for a few things missing here and there, such as modern picture sharing in Jabber, for instance).

I hope to see Pidgin 3 released one of these days, but I won't hold my breath: it's been planned for years now.

All in all, Pidgin works but is losing it's relevance as time goes by. Hope that can be reverted.
summary: Gets the job done, feels outdated

description: Works great and with the plugins it can even handle mattermost etc
Till fedora 27 it was working fine but when i updated to fedora 28 its not working. I tried several times but failed to install it back.

The application is very integrated to the desktop environment and allows to connect to virtually all messaging networks. I use it on my professional laptop to connect with colleagues using on-premises Skype for Business.
summary: Reliable application. Works with virtually any IM network

description: Works fine with Discord, Facebook messenger and ICQ

Very simple procedure to 'connect' XMPP. But it refuses to connect. Ever.
I've seen more useful dung.
This is the best chat app there is! I wish they'd have a mobile Pidgin for Android and iOS. Fingers Crossed!

Skype for Business support is terrible. Messages are frequently dropped or not sent, statuses are never accurately reflected, and it does not import the contact list correctly. Every time I start it up, it will randomly pick some subset of my contacts to just not import, forcing me to go look up their user IDs manually on my other machine.

Figured out how to get the Skype emoji set installed and it works fairly well for communicating with coworkers who are on Windows using Skype for Business. Anytime someone tries to send a file to me or drops an image into chat it hangs and won't complete the transfer for some reason. Also can't figure out how to share my desktop or view someone else's. Haven't found a better IM application that will connect to our Exchange Server though, so I live with the downsides.
awesome messenger
Very good, simple and easy to use
Which was the reason to install it...
summary: No out of the box support for Facebook messenger

Switched to GNOME recently. Hexchat apparently decided to bugout on wayland & crash so... not many other options native to gnome (GTK). This app did the trick. Not fully designed with IRC in mind but... eh, it works and doesn't crash so. That's a plus? Glad it's here & been kickin for years.

Wer XMPP aka Jabber unter GNOME nutzen möchte, kommt an Pidgin fast nicht vorbei. Insbesondere wird im Gegensatz zum nicht mehr weiterentwickelten Empathy OTR unterstützt und die Oberfläche wirkt aufgeräumter als bei Gajim. Lässt sich über eine Extension sehr gut in die GNOME Shell integrieren.

Muy personalizable y el más sencillo de todos los clientes de mensajería instantánea, con gran cantidad de complementos que lo mejoran aún más. Le faltaría mejor soporte para XMPP, especialmente en salas de chat, y también es cierto que guarda las contraseñas en texto plano, pero en lo personal no le encuentro problema. Muy buena la integración con GNOME Shell, aunque se puede mejorar un poco más. A mí me encanta, le doy 5 estrellas y lo recomiendo.
Excelente cliente de mensajeria multiprotocolo :D

Ce matin je me suis dit que peut-être pidgin aurait un peu évolué, il n'en est rien, aucunes évolution à l'heure ou il existe un tas d'applications de communication, et comme je le disais, on est plus dans les années 90 , de plus il n'y a même, pas moyen d'intégrer les applis actuelles , quand a celles et ceux qui disent que ça fait le job, j'ai vraiment de gros doutes sur leurs affirmations. Bref un logiciel même gratuit (????) devrait être maintenu sinon éliminé du catalogue, pour faire la place à d'autres certainement plus performant. Et d'ailleurs il n'y a pas que celui-ci qui est inutile et prend de la place au catalogue, je serai très curieux de connaître les statistiques d'utilisations de ce catalogue. Je ne vais certainement pas me faire de que des amis après le commentaires que je viens de faire, depuis 2008 que j'ai laissé tombé Windows et très content de l'avoir fait.
Je sais bien que mon commentaire va ce noyer parmis les autres mais au moins j'exprime mes convictions et puis comme les logiciels sont en accès libre, il ne faut pas trop demander et que si je ne suis pas satisfais , je n'ai qu'a utiliser autre chose.
summary: Je reviens sur mon commentaire de Janvier

description: Fait le job.

Допустим ставим галочку автоприем файлов и софтина дожна принимать файлы а не делать мне мозг, вместо того чтоб просто принимать файлы в указанную папку мне надо протись по 217183 контактам и на каждом выставить автоприем файлов юзер френдли да? Идем дальже в нашей корпоративной сети необходимо делать переодически делать массовую рассылку (предупреждения, информационные и тд.) и знаете что плагин надо искать черти где и написан он через ориентацию разработчиков данной программы. И подобное во всем, недайбог сменить домен сервера отвалятся половина настроек пользователя, просто писец. К большому сожалению на данный момент отказаться немогу в силу мульти платформенности Голубя но это единственный плю данной программы.
